entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:56 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 07:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with freezing rain beginning early this morning and ending late this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
